title: Create Corrective Maintenance Work Order
description: A field operator notices a leak on a pipeline and creates a work order in the system for maintenance to repair it.

tasks.description: Open the mobile CMMS application and select 'Create New Work Order'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order creation form is displayed.

tasks.description: Fill in the details, including the equipment ID of the pipeline, the location of the leak, and a description of the problem. Set the priority to 'High'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is populated with accurate and complete information.

tasks.description: Submit the work order, which is then automatically routed to the maintenance planner's queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is created in the CMMS and is ready for planning and scheduling.
